>> void ledGrid(int index, int stripLength, int numStrips, float x, float y, float ledSpacing, float stripSpacing, float angle, boolean zigzag);
               
  opc.ledGrid(0, 30, 2, width/2, height *  1/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(1, 30, 2, width/2, height *  3/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(2, 30, 2, width/2, height *  5/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(3, 30, 2, width/2, height *  7/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(4, 30, 2, width/2, height *  9/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(5, 30, 2, width/2, height * 11/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(6, 30, 2, width/2, height * 13/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
  opc.ledGrid(7, 15, 1, width/2, height * 15/15, width/15, height/15, 0.0, true);
